input: I absolutely loved the latest superhero movie. It was full of action and had a great storyline.
Unfortunately, my experience at the cafe was less than ideal. The coffee was too bitter and the service was slow.
This book is a masterpiece, blending intricate plotlines with deep character development.
The software update was a disappointment, as it introduced more bugs than it fixed.
Our vacation was fantastic! The beaches were pristine and the hotel staff was incredibly hospitable.
I'm not happy with my new headphones. The sound quality is poor and they're uncomfortable to wear.
